original: @143b * // dpal bdud rtsi'i sbyar ba brnyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @143b * // dpal bdud rtsi'i sbyar ba brnyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the glorious one who has attained the elixir.

original: spyan ras gzigs dpal bdud rtsi brnyes //🔽bza' dang bca' dang myang ba sman //
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs dpal bdud rtsi brnyes // bza' dang bca' dang myang ba sman //
translated: Avalokiteśvara, having attained the glorious elixir,🔽Edible, chewable, and medicinal substances,

original: btung ba sna tshogs nyid mchod bzhes //
analyzed: btung ba sna tshogs nyid mchod bzhes //
translated: Various drinks, and so forth,

original: skal ldan byin gyis rlob par bshad //
analyzed: skal ldan byin gyis rlob par bshad //
translated: Is said to bless the fortunate.

original: dus dang dus mtshams dga' ston dus //
analyzed: dus dang dus mtshams dga' ston dus //
translated: At the right time, during festivals,

original: bza' dang bza' min bza' yin te //
analyzed: bza' dang bza' min bza' yin te //
translated: Food and non-food are food.

original: rnal 'byor rgyal po dam tshig spyod //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rgyal po dam tshig spyod //
translated: The king of yogis practices the commitments.

original: rab gus mchod byed sbyin la brtson //
analyzed: rab gus mchod byed sbyin la brtson //
translated: With great respect, making offerings, striving in generosity,

original: skad cig dran pas lhar bskyed nas //
analyzed: skad cig dran pas lhar bskyed nas //
translated: Instantly generating deity through mindfulness,

original: bzhi pa'i yi ge sbyor ba yis //🔽mgrin pa lce steng byin brlabs la //
analyzed: bzhi pa'i yi ge sbyor ba yis // mgrin pa lce steng byin brlabs la //
translated: By applying the fourth syllable,🔽Blessing the throat and tongue,

original: aa dang ka phreng gnyis med zhu //
analyzed: aa dang ka phreng gnyis med zhu //
translated: The two garlands of a and ka melt into non-duality.

original: sgron ma gnyis steng rdo rje 'chang //
analyzed: sgron ma gnyis steng rdo rje 'chang //
translated: Above the two lamps is Vajradhara,

original: de bzhin seng ge rnam bsgyings gnyis //
analyzed: de bzhin seng ge rnam bsgyings gnyis //
translated: And likewise the two lions are majestic.

original: rgyur byas thabs dang shes rab bskyed //
analyzed: rgyur byas thabs dang shes rab bskyed //
translated: The method and prajñā are generated as the cause.

original: phreng ba gnyis kyang dgod par bya //
analyzed: phreng ba gnyis kyang dgod par bya //
translated: The two garlands are also arranged.

original: ka p'a la sogs padma can//
analyzed: ka p'a la sogs padma can//
translated: The kapāla and so forth are the lotuses.

original: sna tshogs bza' bas bkang byas la //
analyzed: sna tshogs bza' bas bkang byas la //
translated: Fill it with various foods.

original: snod bcud sbyang dang gzi bskyed pas //
analyzed: snod bcud sbyang dang gzi bskyed pas //
translated: Purify the world and its beings, and by increasing their splendor,

original: gya nom gyur pa rnal 'byor tshogs //
analyzed: gya nom gyur pa rnal 'byor tshogs //
translated: the sublime becomes the assembly of yogins.🔽Om Ah Hrih Bam Ho.

original: aom a'a:hr'i:bam ho:/ dri bsal spyod byed bdud rtsir byed //
analyzed: aom a'a:hr'i:bam ho:/ dri bsal spyod byed bdud rtsir byed //
translated: Remove the smell, make it into conduct, and make it into nectar.

original: phun sum tshogs dang dges byed pa //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs dang dges byed pa //
translated: It is the perfect, delightful

original: dam tshig phyag rgya rnam pa lnga //
analyzed: dam tshig phyag rgya rnam pa lnga //
translated: five-part pledge seal.🔽By the yoga of light,

original: 'od kyi sbyor bas rnam par @144a * //
analyzed: 'od kyi sbyor bas rnam par @144a * //
translated: one should play.

original: rtsen // dpag med bdag lus sangs rgyas la //
analyzed: rtsen // dpag med bdag lus sangs rgyas la //
translated: The immeasurable body of the Buddha

original: bsam mi khyab sprul rtsi yi mtshos //
analyzed: bsam mi khyab sprul rtsi yi mtshos //
translated: is the ocean of the inconceivable emanation elixir.

original: lus lnga dag ni bsgrub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: lus lnga dag ni bsgrub pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to accomplish the five bodies,

original: sgrub pa pos ni mchod par bya //
analyzed: sgrub pa pos ni mchod par bya //
translated: the practitioner should make offerings.

original: aom a'a:hr'i:shr'i lo ka n'a tha sarba buddha bo dha si bh'u padma bi shuddha aa mrita te dza ra bha ksha ta kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi //
analyzed: aom a'a:hr'i:shr'i lo ka n'a tha sarba buddha bo dha si bh'u padma bi shuddha aa mrita te dza ra bha ksha ta kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi //
translated: Om Ah Hrih Shree Lokanatha Sarva Buddha Bodhisattva Bhu Padmaviśuddha Amṛta Tejorāśi Kha Kha Khahi Khahi.

original: aa ne ka satva tsa sa ma ya siddhi sma ra sma ra h'um h'um h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aa ne ka satva tsa sa ma ya siddhi sma ra sma ra h'um h'um h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Anekasattva Samaya Siddhi Smara Smara Hum Hum Hum Svaha.

original: zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod pas so //
translated: Recite this three times.

original: de nas lhag ma bsdus la gtor ma bya'o //
analyzed: de nas lhag ma bsdus la gtor ma bya'o //
translated: Then, having gathered the remainder, one should offer the sacrificial cake.

original: bdag lus rdo rje spyan ras gzigs //
analyzed: bdag lus rdo rje spyan ras gzigs //
translated: My body is Vajra Avalokiteśvara,

original: phung po sangs rgyas rnam pa lnga //
analyzed: phung po sangs rgyas rnam pa lnga //
translated: The aggregates are the five buddhas,

original: bde chen gnyis med phyag rgya che //
analyzed: bde chen gnyis med phyag rgya che //
translated: The great bliss is the nondual mahāmudrā,

original: dpa' bo rnam par rol pa yin //
analyzed: dpa' bo rnam par rol pa yin //
translated: The hero is the one who plays.

original: aom a'a:hr'i:aa ai au ae ao aam /
analyzed: aom a'a:hr'i:aa ai au ae ao aam /
translated: Oṃ āḥ hrīḥ a ai ou an🔽Mahāsukhavajra-tattva sarva-jñāna-svabhāva viśuddha ho ho ho.

original: ma h'a su kha badzra ta t'a sarba dzny'a na sva bh'a wa bi shuddha ho ho ho: zhes glu blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: ma h'a su kha badzra ta t'a sarba dzny'a na sva bh'a wa bi shuddha ho ho ho: zhes glu blang bar bya'o //
translated: One should sing this song.

original: dpal spyan ras gzigs bdud rtsi brnyes pa'i zas kyi cho ga rdzogs so//
analyzed: dpal spyan ras gzigs bdud rtsi brnyes pa'i zas kyi cho ga rdzogs so//
translated: The glorious Avalokiteśvara's nectar-obtaining food ritual is complete.
